template:
### Instruction ###
You receive changes and recommendations made to fields of a ticket from an issue tracker.
Return the data of the changes for each entry in the following format in JSON:
"field": "<name of the missing or outdated field>",
"recommendation": "<only the correction made to the field>",
"reason": "<reason for the recommendation>"

If the list is empty return "Everything is up to date".

### Context ###
Data: {revised_ticket}
